data.title: Cris Alexander
data.text:
AKA Allen Smith

Born: 14-Jan-1920

Birthplace: Tulsa, OK

Died: 7-Mar-2012

Location of death: New York City

Cause of death: Natural Causes

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Gay

Occupation: Photographer, Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Portrait photographer, Broadway actor

Collaborated with Patrick Dennis on two fabricated memoirs, Little Me: The Intimate Memoirs of That Great Star of Stage, Screen, and Television, Belle Poitrine (1961), an achievement in the art of high camp; and First Lady: My Thirty Days Upstairs in the White House (1964), which falls flat.

Boyfriend: John Butler (dancer and choreographer, together 1940s)

Husband: Shaun OÂ’Brien (ballet dancer, together 60 years, m. 2011, d. 23-Feb-2012)

University: University of Oklahoma (attended briefly)

Conservatory: Feagin School of Dramatic Art

Interview Chief Photographer

Risk Factors: Stuttering

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Littlest Angel (6-Dec-1969)
